text: Vinícius Lopes Righi, known as Vinícius (born 29 February 1964) is a former Brazilian football player. He played 7 seasons and 155 games, scoring 40 goals in the Primeira Liga, mostly for Braga and also for Tirsense. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut for Braga on 22 February 1987 as a late substitute in a 0–0 draw against Académica de Coimbra. ==References== ==External links== Category:1964 births Category:Sportspeople from Rio de Janeiro (state) Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Clube de Regatas do Flamengo footballers Category:S.C.
